contentList.content: If you're having trouble winning in combat, try getting better at the game.
Adventurer's become poor when they are out of money.
Remember, licking doorknobs is illegal in other multiverses.
Sometimes when you get stabbed, you'll suffer a stab wound.
The best strategy to defeat difficult enemies is to reduce their health to zero while keeping yours above zero.
Dying horribly for no reason is considered a bad thing by most religions in Faerûn.
Defenseless villagers are no match for Magic Missile.
The trick to winning checks is to roll high numbers.
In the beginning, Toril was created. This had made many people very angry and has been widely regarded as a bad move.
Characters with the "Scavenger" feat will sometimes receive an onion ring in their fries.
"I didn't ask how big the room is. I said 'I cast Fireball'" - Based Wizard
Protip: Pointy end goes towards the enemy.
Loading screens often give tips for better gameplay.
If you talk to random NPCs, you'll be in a conversation.
Enemy wizards are vulnerable to personal insults.
Keep an eye out for Us' sibling, We!
Vicious Mockery is a great way to mock someone viciously.
"People don't think Faerûn be like it is, but it do." - Gandalf
Having a hard time on Honor Mode? Maybe Explorer is more your speed there, champ.
This Steel Watcher kills fascists.
Hold onto those healing potions, you might need them later!
Keep an eye out for important crafting ingredients like rope or empty bottles.
John Baldur is a pretty cool guy. Eh kills mind flayers and doesn't afraid of anything.
"Release your inhibitions, feel the rain on your skin." - legendary bard Bedingfield
Press Alt + F4 to equip a shield during combat.
Snape killed Dumbledore
Reticulating splines...
Dying hurts. Don't.
To defeat a red dragon, kill it until it dies.
Healing potions can be used to heal you.
Bandits usually do not expect to be robbed. You can use this to your advantage.
Remember, crying is a free action.
"Always stand up for yourself. Never pass up the opportunity to escalate a minor disagreement into life-changing violence." - WungusBill

Guide to Paladin Oaths: Ancients like nature, Conquest likes suffering, Crown likes rules, Devotion likes honesty, Glory like themselves, Redemption fucked up, Vengeance fucks you up, Watchers hate interplanar beings, Oathbreakers hate you
Hello World!
"Good argument. Unfortunately, I cast testicular torsion." - Elminster
Welcome to Act 4!
If you can read this, you're too close.
Sticks and stones may break my bones but Meteor Swarm will hurt way worse.
"If there's anything more important than my ego around, I want it caught and stabbed now." -Lorroakan
To avoid losing a battle, trying winning.
Wait, you actually lost to the Intellect Devourer's on the beach? lol
Hostile NPCs just need a hug.
If you're overencumbered, have Karlach carry your weak ass.
Having trouble with combat? Have you tried getting good?
Summon Exodia and send that motherfucker to the Shadow Realm.
Committing a crime is illegal.
Insert humorous sentence here.
If you need to rest for a long time, you should take a Long Rest.
